title: Mac Launcher Won't Open
body: So I have a Mac, and installed LOL. It has worked and I've been able to log on, but last night for some reason I can't log in anymore. Whenever I type in my username and password, it just takes forever and says authenticating, then it says there was an error. I've tried reinstalling, and I still doesn't work. What do I do?

replies.body: It sounds like that might be related to an unstable connection with the login servers, which you should be able to get around by switching to an ethernet connection or updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Do me a favor and check those really quick and let me know if it helps or not.
